author: mingyue
name: github-external
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/core/templates/canonical-uri-external-image":{"title":"$:/core/templates/canonical-uri-external-image","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<!--

This template is used to assign the ''_canonical_uri'' field to external images.

Change the `./images/` part to a different base URI. The URI can be relative or absolute.

-->
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/{{$:/GitHub/Repo}}/{{$:/GitHub/Branch}}/{{$:/plugins/mingyue/github-external/tiddler-folder-name}}/<$view field="title" format="urlencoded"/><$currsuffix type={{!!type}}>"},"$:/core/templates/canonical-uri-external-text":{"title":"$:/core/templates/canonical-uri-external-text","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<!--

This template is used to assign the ''_canonical_uri'' field to external text files.

Change the `./text/` part to a different base URI. The URI can be relative or absolute.

-->
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/{{$:/GitHub/Repo}}/{{$:/GitHub/Branch}}/{{$:/plugins/mingyue/github-external/tiddler-folder-name}}/<$view field="title" format="urlencoded"/><$currsuffix type={{!!type}}>"},"$:/plugins/mingyue/github-external/ControlPanel/Settings.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/mingyue/github-external/ControlPanel/Settings.css","text":".itkg-setting-tags-item input {
  margin-left: 5px;
  padding: 2px;
}
","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet"},"$:/plugins/mingyue/github-external/ControlPanel/Settings":{"title":"$:/plugins/mingyue/github-external/ControlPanel/Settings","caption":"GithubPagesExternal","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel/SettingsTab","text":"!!! [[Repo|$:/GitHub/Repo]]

This is the user name + / + repo name, e.g. `linonetwo/wiki`

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/GitHub/Repo" field="text" tag=input class="w-100" />

!!! [[Branch|$:/GitHub/Branch]]

This usually is `master` or `main`

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/GitHub/Branch" field="text" tag=input class="w-100" />

!!! [[tiddler-folder-name|$:/plugins/mingyue/github-external/tiddler-folder-name]]

This usually is just `tiddlers`

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/mingyue/github-external/tiddler-folder-name" field="text" tag=input class="w-100" />"},"$:/plugins/mingyue/github-external/currsuffix.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/mingyue/github-external/currsuffix.js","text":"!function(){"use strict";var t=require("$:/core/modules/widgets/widget.js").widget,o=require("$:/plugins/mingyue/github-external/mime.js")._MIME;class e extends t{constructor(t,e){super(t,e)}render(t,e){this.parentDomNode=t,this.computeAttributes(),this.execute(),console.log(this.title,this.type);var s=Array();for(const r of o)s.push(r[2]);var i=this.title.split(".").slice(-1)[0].trim();if(i&&s.includes(i))this.result_suffix=i;else for(const u of o)this.type===u[0]&&(Array.isArray(u[2])&&(this.result_suffix=u[2][0]),"string"==typeof u[2])&&(this.result_suffix=u[2]);console.log(`${this.title} ${this.type} `+this.result_suffix);i=this.document.createTextNode(this.result_suffix);t.insertBefore(i,e),this.domNodes.push(i)}execute(){this.title=this.getVariable("currentTiddler"),this.type=this.getAttribute("type","")}refresh(t){return!!this.computeAttributes().text&&(this.refreshSelf(),!0)}}exports.currsuffix=e}();","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"widget"},"$:/GitHub/Branch":{"title":"$:/GitHub/Branch","text":"master"},"$:/GitHub/Repo":{"title":"$:/GitHub/Repo","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"tiddly-gittly/TW5-T-ONLINE"},"$:/plugins/mingyue/github-external/tiddler-folder-name":{"title":"$:/plugins/mingyue/github-external/tiddler-folder-name","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"tiddlers"},"$:/plugins/mingyue/github-external/mime.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/mingyue/github-external/mime.js","text":"const
